TEXT.line: Hello, Whenua! I thought you might need a hand; was I right?
Yes, you did well...Thank you, Nokama!
Without your help, we might have lost this!
Yes! Rahaga Norik has set us on a mission to find the Mask Of Light.
Go to Ga-Metru and find the fourth Makoki stone!
I will be there before you can get out of this place! See you soon!
